graze.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: if an animal grazes, or if you graze it, it eats grass that is growing
graze.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: fields where they used to graze their sheep
Groups of cattle were grazing on the rich grass.
graze.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: to accidentally break the surface of your skin by rubbing it against something
graze.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: I fell on the gravel, severely grazing my knee.
graze.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: to touch something lightly while passing it, sometimes damaging it
graze.translation[0].definitions[3].defi: to eat small amounts of food all through the day instead of having regular meals
graze.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: a wound caused by rubbing that slightly breaks the surface of your skin
graze.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: Adam walked away from the crash with just a graze on his left shoulder.
